name: dnd-dice-roller
description: 1. A webapp that helps the user roll their dice for board games like Dungeons and Dragons. 2. How to use - Choose the type of dice - Choose the number of dice  - Press "Roll" - Press "Reset" to return to the homepage  - Press "Reroll" to continue rolling with the currently chosen set of dice  3. Made with HTML, CSS, Javascript + Webpack
